entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:13 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 9:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 3. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
